verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3004>spake<s%> <S%G2532>a<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> to this end, that men <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G1573>faint;<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> There <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G2923>judge,<s%> which <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> regarded <S%G1788><s%> man: <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1556>Avenge<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> adversary. <S%G476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> for a while: <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5550><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1499>Though<s%> I <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> regard <S%G1788><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

Yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> troubleth <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> I will <S%G1556>avenge<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> by her continual <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> she <S%G5299>weary<s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G93>unjust<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> saith. <S%G3004><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> avenge <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1557><s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1588>elect,<s%> which <S%G994>cry<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>though<s%> he bear <S%G3114>long<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> them? <S%G846><s%>

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he will avenge <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1557><s%> them <S%G846><s%> speedily. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> <S%G687>shall<s%> he <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> earth? <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> which <S%G3982>trusted<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>were<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1848>despised<s%> others: <S%G3062><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple<s%> to <S%G4336>pray;<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> a publican. <S%G5057><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> are, <S%G727>extortioners,<s%> <S%G94>unjust,<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> publican. <S%G5057><s%>
I <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>week,<s%> I give <S%G586>tithes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3745>that<s%> I possess. <S%G2932><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5057>publican,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> afar <S%G3113>off,<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> lift <S%G1869>up<s%> so much <S%G3761>as<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5180>smote<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4738>breast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G2433>merciful<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> rather <S%G2228>than<s%> the other: <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G5312>exalteth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>abased;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> he that <S%G5013>humbleth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1025>infants,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he would <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> little <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2967>forbid<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> not: <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> of <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a little <S%G3813>child<s%> shall in no <S%G3364>wise<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> therein. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3004>callest<s%> thou <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G18>good?<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> that is, God. <S%G2316><s%>

Thou <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> bear false <S%G5576>witness,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> mother. <S%G3384><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3503>youth<s%> up.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> <S%G3007>lackest<s%> <S%G4671>thou<s%> one thing: <S%G1520><s%> <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3745>that<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1239>distribute<s%> unto the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1204>come,<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> he <S%G1096>was<s%> very <S%G4036>sorrowful:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> very <S%G4036>sorrowful,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G1423>hardly<s%> shall they that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5536>riches<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G4476>needle's<s%> <S%G5168>eye,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a rich <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they that <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> The things which are <S%G102>impossible<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Lo,<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> There <S%G2076>is<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> hath <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> for the kingdom of God's sake, <S%G1752><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G618>receive<s%> manifold <S%G4179>more<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> present <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> unto him <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we go <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> concerning <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be accomplished. <S%G5055><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall be <S%G1702>mocked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> spitefully <S%G5195>entreated,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> spitted on: <S%G1716><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall <S%G3146>scourge<s%> him, and put him to death: <S%G615><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he shall rise again. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G4920>understood<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G5130>things:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> they the things which were <S%G3004>spoken.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that as <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> blind <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> way <S%G3598>side<s%> begging: <S%G4319><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> pass <S%G1279>by,<s%> he <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G1498>meant.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> passeth <S%G3928>by.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G994>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3165>me.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they which went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should hold his <S%G4623>peace:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> so <S%G4183>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> Thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3165>me.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>near,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2309>wilt<s%> thou that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> unto thee? <S%G4671><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may receive my <S%G308>sight.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Receive thy sight: <S%G308><s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> hath <S%G4982>saved<s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> he received his <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G136>praise<s%> unto <S%G2316>God.<s%>
